title: Courtney Stodden & Doug Hutchison To Renew Their Vows Because Dourtney Is Forever
title_page: Courtney Stodden & Doug Hutchison To Renew Their Vows Because Dourtney Is Forever
text:
May we never doubt the power of true love, may we never doubt the power of VH1 reality series Couples Therapy, may we never doubt the power of Dr. Jenn Berman, and may we never doubt the power of Dourtney: Courtney Stodden and Doug Hutchison are giving the being married thing another shot. Yup, Couples Therapy alumni Stodden and Hutchison are engaged again.
Last fall, the couple filed for legal separation after three years of marriage. Why? Stodden wanted to, as Real Housewives of Orange County's Vicki Gunvalson would say, whoop it up and be a teen. Back in Nov.,19-year-old Stodden told E! News she and 54-year-old Hutchison split up so that she could " be free and embrace my independence and not neglect my youth." It looked like it that would be the end of Dourtney.
BUT THAT WOULD NOT BE THE END OF DOURTNEY! They're back on, and they will renew their vows later this year. DOURTNEEEEEEEY RIDES AGAIN.
Momager Krista Keller told PEOPLE that Stodden dated here and there during the separation, but "she found out that she really, really loves Doug and he's the one she wants to spend the rest of her life with."
Stodden confirmed that she and Hutchison are indeed re-affianced:
My joy is so real. Excuse me, rill.
